comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: On June 5, 1915, he sailed for Rome on the DUCA DEGLI ABRUZZI with twelve gold medals won by Italy at the Panama-Pacific Exhibition. See NYT of June 6, 1915 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9E00E6D91F3EE733A...

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: He had arrived in New York the year before to supervise the construction of the Italian exhibition at the San Francisco fair, then returned to New York in February, 1915 to attend the fair on behalf of Italy. Those arrivals are also pictured in Bain photos. www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/tags/ernestonat... He doesn't look as happy to return to an Italy which had just entered the war.
